page.title: 18CUSTOMS 1
page.content: The wartime association between Col. Maurice Buckmaster & M. Jean Laurent has linked Crowborough with Montargis, France for the past 20 years.The Mon_ targis Carnival Queen attends Crowboro Carnival in September.About 300 people travel between Crowboro' and Montargis annually.The Crowborough Committee Chairman arranges accommodation for the visitors and excursions to London & places of interest.All clubs compete regularly in both countries _ football rugby,swimming,chess,stamp,tabletennis cycling,Bonfire & Rotory Club.Both young and old visit Montargis. Visits are usually from Thursday evenings to Monday.Travelling by coach costs Â£40 per person. Crowborough was presented with the European Flag by East Sussex County Council to promote understan_ ding and efforts for being twin towns.
